exec: tests["Response time is less than 200ms"] = responseTime < 200;

item.name: Get the Data Types list with not valid filter
POST the Data Type with the existing code

body.raw:
{
    "name": "MyDataType11",
    "code": "AAA",
    "attributes": [{
